content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

### Second Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### Iron Ore Mining Area
Consists of:
- Nearest iron ore resource (position -15.5, -50.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into furnaces without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert into the furnace. Check your inventory status to avoid this error.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
